All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthenticationService
Service class responsible for handling authentication-related operations, including extracting user information from JWT tokens in the request header.
DataInitializer
Initializes tournament data when the application starts.
EmailContentBuilder
Utility class to build email content related to tournaments.
EmailServiceClient
A client service for sending tournament-related email notifications.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler to catch and handle specific exceptions in the application.
JwtRequestFilter
This filter intercepts incoming HTTP requests to extract and validate JWT tokens.
JwtUtil
Utility class for handling JWT token creation, validation, and claims extraction.
MatchmakingDTO
Data Transfer Object for matchmaking operations in a tournament.
MatchServiceClient
A client service for managing matchmaking and tournament finalization operations.
PlayerAlreadySignedUpException
Exception thrown when a player attempts to sign up for a tournament they are already signed up for.
PlayerBlacklistedException
Exception thrown when a player who is blacklisted attempts to participate in a tournament.
PlayerDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a player in the chess tournament system.
PlayerEligibilityChecker
Utility class to check if a player is eligible to participate in a tournament.
PlayerIneligibleException
Exception thrown when a player attempts to participate in a tournament but is ineligible.
PlayerNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a player is not found in the system.
PlayerNotSignedUpException
Exception thrown when a player attempts to perform an action without being signed up for the tournament.
PlayerServiceClient
A client service for retrieving player details.
RegistrationPeriodException
Exception thrown when a player attempts to register outside the allowed registration period for a tournament.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for application security settings.
TimeControlSetting
Represents the time control settings for a chess game, including the base time (in minutes) and the increment time (in seconds) for each move.
TimeControlSetting.TimeControlType
Enum representing the types of time control used in chess games.
Tournament
Represents a chess tournament, containing information such as tournament details, participants, time control settings, and status.
Tournament.TournamentFormat
Enum representing the format of the tournament, such as knockout, round robin, or Swiss.
Tournament.TournamentStatus
Enum representing the status of the tournament.
TournamentAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when an admin attempts to create a tournament that already exists.
TournamentController
REST controller for managing tournaments.
TournamentDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a tournament.
TournamentMapper
A utility class to map between Tournament entities and their corresponding TournamentDTO objects, as well as TournamentPlayer entities and their TournamentPlayerDTO counterparts.
TournamentNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a tournament with the specified ID is not found.
TournamentNotificationDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a tournament notification.
TournamentPlayer
Represents a player participating in a tournament.
TournamentPlayer.TournamentPlayerStatus
Enum representing the possible statuses of a player in the tournament.
TournamentPlayerDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a player in a tournament.
TournamentPlayerRepository
Repository interface for accessing TournamentPlayer entities.
TournamentRepository
Repository interface for accessing Tournament entities.
TournamentService
Service interface for managing tournaments, including operations for creating, updating, and retrieving tournaments, as well as managing player participation.
TournamentServiceApplication
 
TournamentServiceImpl
 
TournamentServiceImplTest
 
UnauthorizedActionException
Exception thrown when a user attempts to perform an action they are not authorized for.
UserDTO
Data Transfer Object representing a user.
